about_the_game:
A tale in which the hunter must venture into the underworld in pursuit of an innocent soul. Moldering dragons, shades of the dead, and other creatures of darkness will do everything in their power to ensure you never return to see the light of day again.



Our hero will not be bereft of support from beautiful women in the blood-soaked wastes, though the heroines may not be entirely human. Will our intrepid hunter manage to overcome the trials and tribulations on the arduous road ahead? And will he be able to outwit the Lord of the Damned himself to save his soul from the jaws of hell?



ATTENTION! This DLC is not a continuation of the main storyline from Knightly Passions. This is a completely new and different storyline for the hunter. Some characters will already be known to you, or present in a new guise, while others will be entirely new.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature content. All characters involved in mature content are adults. Content Warning: explicit sexual content, nudity, sex under hypnosis, graphic violence, gore, suicide, foul language, and alcohol and tobacco use. Player discretion is advised.

detailed_description:
A tale in which the hunter must venture into the underworld in pursuit of an innocent soul. Moldering dragons, shades of the dead, and other creatures of darkness will do everything in their power to ensure you never return to see the light of day again.



Our hero will not be bereft of support from beautiful women in the blood-soaked wastes, though the heroines may not be entirely human. Will our intrepid hunter manage to overcome the trials and tribulations on the arduous road ahead? And will he be able to outwit the Lord of the Damned himself to save his soul from the jaws of hell?



ATTENTION! This DLC is not a continuation of the main storyline from Knightly Passions. This is a completely new and different storyline for the hunter. Some characters will already be known to you, or present in a new guise, while others will be entirely new.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB display memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB display memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
